snippet.title: Rogue Mansion - Kickstarter | First Teaser
snippet.description:
Get notified when Rogue Mansion launches on Kickstarter this summer:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pinkydev/rogue-mansion

Rogue Mansion is a survival horror game mixed with rogue-like mechanics. Fight all kinds of creatures, solve enigmatic puzzles and look for anything that could be useful to escape alive from the ever-changing interiors of a mysterious mansion.

#roguemansion #almenaragames #kickstarter #indiedev #madewithunity

Learn more about the game: https://www.almenaragames.com/rogue-mansion
Give us a like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AlmenaraGames
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/almenaragames
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/almenaragames/
